I had the pleasure of managing Raz Galili at Scentric, Inc. where we developed cutting edge enterprise storage management solutions. I have found him to be an excellent, clear minded and task oriented software engineer with a unique ability to focus on a task from start to finish without losing himself or the target I would regularly give Raz the most demanding assignments that required design, careful implementation and I have never regretted it.
